documentation.xhtml:p: sensor for cars in the A and C turning lane

content.xhtml:p: A and C Turn signal. if ACT sensor detects a car, stays on green for 20s else stay on green only for 4s then Yellow for 4s And Red if it's not Yellow or Green
A and C Straight signal. Stays on green for 20s Yellow for 4 And Red if it's not Yellow or Green
B and D Turn signal. Stays on green for 20s Yellow for 4 And Red if it's not Yellow or Green
B and D Straight signal. Stays on green for 20s Yellow for 4 And Red if it's not Yellow or Green
